ygData.subject: Re: Charm song...
ygData.msgSnippet: WOW! Great stuff John :) ... This part can be kinda funny though.  I was using charm to take on a pair of shadowmen in WC the other night.  I had charmed the
ygData.messageBody:
WOW! Great stuff John :)

>From: <kim@...>
>- A lot of players don't understand that when two mobs fight, it's usually
>because one is charmed, and they'll jump in to "your" fight without
>asking.

This part can be kinda funny though. I was using charm to take on a pair of
shadowmen in WC the other night. I had charmed the Necro caster and was
doing well (it had feared it's ex-pet away and was beating the melee mob
down well) when a party came by and 'decided' to help. Well they blew all
their mana on the Necro mob (my pet). It killed the melee SM and then
easily finished of the nearly dead caster.

Also if anyone has not volunteered yet I have a chunk of webspace available
on my @home account that can be used to host the final guide, along with the
FAQ for the list if it is needed.


Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
Master Craftsmen of Societus Argenti
